abstract:
Deterministic mathematical models (called Compartmental models) of disease propagation such as the SIR model and its variants (MSIR, Carrier state, SEIR, SEIS, MSEIR, MSEIRS models) are used to study the propagation of COVID19 in a large population with specific reference to India.
Competing Interest Statement
The authors have declared no competing interest.
Funding Statement
affiliations: Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati provided us the basic infrastructure necessary for this work
author: Nithin K Rajendran; Girish Setlur; Anish Chandrachud; Ashish Menon
title: Modelling and simulation of COVID-19 propagation in a large population with specific reference to India

funding.funding-statement: No external funding was acquired for this work. We'd like to acknowledge that Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati provided us the basic infrastructure necessary for this work.
